file.name: component_analyses.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Analytics Core API Specs for Version 2
  version: '2.1'
servers:
- url: https://f8a-analytics-2445582058137.production.gw.apicast.io/api/v2
  description: "Dependency Analytics Server"
security:
- tokenAuth: []
paths:
  /component-analyses/:
    post:
      tags:
        - CA batch call
      summary: Get security and other details about a software component and recommendations to change to a more secured version in a batched manner.
      parameters:
        - name: uuid
          in: header
          description: User Identification uuid
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-Request-ID
          in: header
          description: Unique id for every CA call
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: X-Telemetry-ID
          in: header
          description: Unique RedHat id
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/RequestPackageDetails'

      responses:
        200:
          description: Detailed response for the requested application component batch
          headers:
            uuid:
              schema:
                type: string
              description: User uuid.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  anyOf:
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/FreeUserBatch'
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/RegisteredUserBatch'
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/NoVulnerabilities'
              examples:
                FreeUser Batch:
                  $ref: '#/components/examples/free-user-batch'
                RegisteredUser Batch:
                  $ref: '#/components/examples/registered-user-batch'
                No Vulnerability Batch:
                  $ref: '#/components/examples/no-vul-batch'

        202:
          description: If any of Package is unknown, We will have 202 response status code.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  anyOf:
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnknownPkgResponse'
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/RegisteredUserBatch'
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/FreeUserBatch'
              examples:
                All Packages Unknown:
                  $ref: '#/components/examples/all-packages-unknown'
                Some Packages Unknown:
                  $ref: '#/components/examples/some-packages-unknown'

        401:
          description: Request unauthorized
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Endpoint not found
          content: {}


  /component-analyses/{eco}/{name}/{ver}:
    get:
      tags:
      - CA Singular Call
      summary: Get security and other details about a software component and recommendations
        to change to a more secured version
      operationId: da_scanner.api_v2.component-analyses
      parameters:
      - name: eco
        in: path
        description: component ecosystem
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: name
        in: path
        description: component name
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: ver
        in: path
        description: component version
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: uuid
        in: header
        description: User Identification uuid
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string

      responses:
        200:
          description: Detailed response for the requested application component
          headers:
            uuid:
              schema:
                type: string
              description: User uuid.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                items:
                  oneOf:
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/RegisteredUser'
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/FreeUser'
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/NoVulnerabilities'
              examples:
                FreeUser:
                  $ref: '#/components/examples/free-user'
                RegisteredUser:
                  $ref: '#/components/examples/registered-user'
                No Vulnerability:
                  $ref: '#/components/examples/no-vul'

        202:
          description: Package is currently Unavailable. Please try again later
          content: {}
        401:
          description: Request unauthorized
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Data not found
          content: {}

components:
  examples:
    free-user-batch:
      value:
        - package: "django"
          version: "1.1"
          package_unknown: false
          vulnerabilities:
            - id: "SNYK-2010-3082"
              cvss: "1.2"
              is_private: false
              cwes:
                - "CWE-264"
              cvss_v3: "CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N"
              severity: "medium"
              title: "Information Exposure"
              url: "https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-DJANGO-40055"
              cve_ids:
                - "CVE-2010-4534"
              fixed_in:
                - "1.1.3"
                - "1.2.4"
            - id: "SYNK-2018-1002"
              cvss: "1.2"
              is_private: false
              cwes:
                - "CWE-264"
              cvss_v3: "CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N"
              severity: "medium"
              title: "Information Exposure"
              url: "https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-DJANGO-40055"
              cve_ids:
                - "CVE-2010-4534"
              fixed_in:
                - "1.1.3"
                - "1.2.4"
          recommended_versions : "2"
          message: "2 vulnerabilities within this dependency"
          highest_severity: "high"
          known_security_vulnerability_count: 2
          security_advisory_count: 1
          registration_link: "https://app.snyk.io/login"

        - package: "mango"
          version: "2.1"
          package_unknown: false
          vulnerabilities:
            - id: "SNYK-2010-3082"
              cvss: "1.2"
              is_private: false
              cwes:
                - "CWE-264"
              cvss_v3: "CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N"
              severity: "medium"
              title: "Information Exposure"
              url: "https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-DJANGO-40055"
              cve_ids:
                - "CVE-2010-4534"
              fixed_in:
                - "1.1.3"
                - "1.2.4"
            - id: "SNYK-2010-3082"
              cvss: "1.2"
              is_private: false
              cwes:
                - "CWE-264"
              cvss_v3: "CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N"
              severity: "medium"
              title: "Information Exposure"
              url: "https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-DJANGO-40055"
              cve_ids: [
                "CVE-2010-4534"
              ]
              fixed_in:
                - "1.1.3"
                - "1.2.4"
          recommended_versions : "2"
          message: "2 vulnerabilities within this dependency"
          highest_severity: "high"
          known_security_vulnerability_count: 2
          security_advisory_count: 1
          registration_link: "https://app.snyk.io/login"

    registered-user-batch:
      value:
        - package: "django"
          version: "1.1"
          package_unknown: false
          vulnerabilities:
            - id: "SNYK-2010-3082"
              cvss: "1.2"
              is_private: false
              cwes:
                - "CWE-264"
              cvss_v3: "CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N"
              severity: "medium"
              title: "Information Exposure"
              url: "https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-DJANGO-40055"
              cve_ids: [
                "CVE-2010-4534"
              ]
              fixed_in:
                - "1.1.3"
                - "1.2.4"
            - id: "SNYK-2010-30812"
              cvss: "1.2"
              is_private: false
              cwes:
                - "CWE-264"
              cvss_v3: "CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N"
              severity: "medium"
              title: "Information Exposure"
              url: "https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-DJANGO-40055"
              cve_ids: [
                "CVE-2010-4534"
              ]
              fixed_in:
                - "1.1.3"
                - "1.2.4"
          recommended_versions : "2"
          message: "3 vulnerabilities within this dependency, 1 exploitable vulnerabilities"
          highest_severity: "high"
          known_security_vulnerability_count: 2
          security_advisory_count: 1
          exploitable_vulnerabilities_count: 1
          vendor_package_link: "https://snyk.io/vuln/maven:org.zeroturnaround%3Azt-zip"
        - package: "mango"
          version: "2.1"
          package_unknown: false
          vulnerabilities:
            - id: "SNYK-2010-1111"
              cvss: "1.2"
              is_private: false
              cwes:
                - "CWE-264"
              cvss_v3: "CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N"
              severity: "medium"
              title: "Information Exposure"
              url: "https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-DJANGO-40055"
              cve_ids: [
                "CVE-2010-4534"
              ]
              fixed_in:
                - "1.1.3"
                - "1.2.4"
            - id: "SNYK-2010-0000"
              cvss: "1.2"
              is_private: false
              cwes:
                - "CWE-264"
              cvss_v3: "CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N"
              severity: "medium"
              title: "Information Exposure"
              url: "https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-DJANGO-40055"
              cve_ids: [
                "CVE-2010-4534"
              ]
              fixed_in:
                - "1.1.3"
                - "1.2.4"
          recommended_versions : "2"
          message: "3 vulnerabilities within this dependency, 1 exploitable vulnerabilities"
          highest_severity: "high"
          known_security_vulnerability_count: 2
          security_advisory_count: 1
          exploitable_vulnerabilities_count: 1
          vendor_package_link: "https://snyk.io/vuln/maven:org.zeroturnaround%3Azt-zip"
    no-vul-batch:
      value:
        - package: "django"
          version: "1.1"
          recommendation: {}

    registered-user:
      value:
        package: "django"
        version: "1.1"
        recommendation:
          component_analyses:
            vulnerability:
              - vendor_cve_ids: "SNYK-2018-1002"
                cvss: "1.2"
                is_private: true
              - vendor_cve_ids: "SNYK-2010-3082"
                cvss: "1.3"
                is_private: false
          recommended_version : "2"
          message: "3 vulnerabilities within this dependency, 1 exploitable vulnerabilities"
          severity: "high"
          public_vulnerabilities_count: 2
          private_vulnerabilities_count: 1
          exploitable_vulnerabilities_count: 1
          vendor_package_link: "https://snyk.io/vuln/maven:org.zeroturnaround%3Azt-zip"

    free-user:
      value:
        package: "mango"
        version: "2.1"
        recommendation:
          component_analyses:
            vulnerability:
              - vendor_cve_ids: "SNYK-2018-1002"
                cvss: "1.2"
                is_private: true
              - vendor_cve_ids: "SNYK-2010-3082"
                cvss: "1.3"
                is_private: false
          recommended_version : "2"
          message: "2 vulnerabilities within this dependency"
          severity: "high"
          public_vulnerabilities_count: 2
          private_vulnerabilities_count: 1
          registration_link: "https://app.snyk.io/login"

    no-vul:
      value:
        package: "mango"
        version: "2.1"
        recommendation: {}

    all-packages-unknown:
      value:
        - package: "django"
          version: "1.1"
          package_unknown: true

    some-packages-unknown:
      value:
        - package: "django"
          version: "1.1"
          package_unknown: false
          vulnerability:
            - id: "SNYK-2010-0000"
              cvss: "1.2"
              is_private: false
              cwes:
                - "CWE-264"
              cvss_v3: "CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N"
              severity: "medium"
              title: "Information Exposure"
              url: "https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-DJANGO-40055"
              cve_ids: [
                "CVE-2010-4534"
              ]
              fixed_in:
                - "1.1.3"
                - "1.2.4"
          recommended_versions : "2"
          message: "2 vulnerabilities within this dependency"
          highest_severity: "high"
          known_security_vulnerability_count: 2
          security_advisory_count: 1
          registration_link: "https://app.snyk.io/login"
        - package: "django"
          version: "1.1"
          package_unknown: true
  schemas:
    RequestPackageDetails:
      title: CA Batch Call Request Body
      type: object
      properties:
        ecosystem:
          type: string
          enum:
            - maven
            - pypi
            - npm
        package_versions:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
                package:
                  type: string
                version:
                  type: string
          example:
            - package: django
              version: 1.1
            - package: mango
              version: 2.1

    RegisteredUserBatch:
      title: Vendor Private Recommendation
      type: object
      properties:
        package_unknown:
          type: boolean
          example: False
        package:
          type: string
          example: "django"
        version:
          type: string
          example: "1.1"
        recommended_versions:
          type: string
          example: 2
        vulnerability:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/VulnerabilityDetailsBatch'
        message:
          type: string
          example: "3 vulnerabilities within this dependency, 1 exploitable vulnerabilities"
        highest_severity:
          type: string
          example: "high"
        known_security_vulnerability_count:
          type: integer
          example: 0
        security_advisory_count:
          type: integer
          example: 0
        exploitable_vulnerabilities_count:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        vendor_package_link:
          type: string
          example : "https://snyk.io/vuln/maven:org.webjars%3Ajquery-form"

    FreeUserBatch:
      title: Vendor Public Recommendation
      type: object
      properties:
        package:
          type: string
          example: "django"
        package_unknown:
          type: boolean
          example: False
        version:
          type: string
          example: "1.1"
        recommended_versions:
          type: string
          example: "3.1"
        vulnerability:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/VulnerabilityDetailsBatch'
        message:
          type: string
          example: "2 vulnerabilities within this dependency"
        highest_severity:
          type: string
          example: "high"
        known_security_vulnerability_count:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        security_advisory_count:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        registration_link:
          type: string
          example : "https://app.snyk.io/login"

    VulnerabilityDetailsBatch:
      title: Vulnerability Details Batch
      description: Information of the vulnerability found
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          example: "SNYK-1234"
        cvss:
          type: string
          example: 9.2
        is_private:
          type: boolean
          example: true
        cwes:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          example:
            - "CWE-264"
        cvss_v3:
          type: string
          example: "CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N"
        severity:
          type: string
          example: "medium"
        title:
          type: string
          example: "Information Exposure"
        url:
          type: string
          example: "https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-DJANGO-40055"
        cve_ids:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          example:
            - "CVE-2010-4534"
        fixed_in:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          example:
            - "1.1.3"
            - "1.2.4"

    UnknownPkgResponse:
      title: All Unknown Packages Response
      description: Information of the vulnerability found
      type: object
      properties:
        package:
          type: string
          example: "django"
        package_unknown:
          type: boolean
          example: true
        version:
          type: string
          example: "1.1"

    VulnerabilityDetails:
      title: Vulnerability Details
      description: Information of the vulnerability found
      type: object
      properties:
        vulnerability:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              vendor_cve_ids:
                type: string
                example: "SNYK-1234"
              cvss:
                type: string
                example: 9.2
              is_private:
                type: boolean
                example: true
              cve_ids:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: string
                example:
                  - CVE-2014-0474
                  - CVE-2014-0475
              cwes:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: string
                example:
                  - CWE-185
                  - CWE-730
              cvss_v3:
                type: string
                example: "CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H"
              severity:
                type: string
                enum:
                  - low
                  - medium
                  - high
                  - critical
              title:
                type: string
                example: SQL Injection
              url:
                type: string
                example: https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-DJANGO-4002
              fixed_in:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: string
                example:
                  - ">=0.19.0-beta.1"

    RegisteredUser:
      title: Vendor Private Recommendation
      type: object
      properties:
        package:
          type: string
          example: "django"
        version:
          type: string
          example: "1.1"
        recommendation:
          type: object
          properties:
            recommended_version:
              type: string
              example: 2
            component_analyses:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VulnerabilityDetails'
            message:
              type: string
              example: "3 vulnerabilities within this dependency, 1 exploitable vulnerabilities"
            severity:
              type: string
              example: "high"
            known_security_vulnerability_count:
              type: integer
              example: 0
            security_advisory_count:
              type: integer
              example: 0
            exploitable_vulnerabilities_count:
              type: integer
              example: 1
            vendor_package_link:
              type: string
              example : "https://snyk.io/vuln/maven:org.webjars%3Ajquery-form"

    FreeUser:
      title: Vendor Public Recommendation
      type: object
      properties:
        package:
          type: string
          example: "django"
        version:
          type: string
          example: "1.1"
        recommendation:
          type: object
          properties:
            recommended_version:
              type: string
              example: "3.1"
            component_analyses:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VulnerabilityDetails'
            message:
              type: string
              example: "2 vulnerabilities within this dependency"
            highest_severity:
              type: string
              example: "high"
            known_security_vulnerability_count:
              type: integer
              example: 1
            security_advisory_count:
              type: integer
              example: 1
            registration_link:
              type: string
              example : "https://app.snyk.io/login"

    NoVulnerabilities:
      title: No Vulnerability Response
      type: object
      properties:
        package:
          type: string
          example: "django"
        version:
          type: string
          example: "1.1"
        recommendation:
          type: object
          example: {}

  securitySchemes:
    tokenAuth:
      type: apiKey
      description: 3Scale Token Auth is used for Authentication
      name: user_key
      in: query

Error: notImplemented: path "/component-analyses/": post: responses: 200: contents: application/json: generate schema: item: anyOf: complex anyOf not implemented
